sense.def:
Kadar ena država ali skupina ljudi
conquers another
, prevzame popoln nadzor nad ozemljem druge države ali nad skupino ljudi.

seg.quote: ...the white people who had conquered their land.
Britain was conquered by the Romans.

sense.def:
To conquer something difficult or dangerous
pomeni, da se nam posreči uničiti ali prevzeti nadzor nad nečim težavnim ali nevarnim.

seg.quote: ...a tremendous international effort to conquer cancer.
